person.persName: Peter B. Bruner, Jr. (Hancock County, KY, farmer & home guard soldier)

body.p: Hancock County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Hannah Davis Bruner. Father of George W. Bruner, Cynthia E. Bruner, Davis T. Bruner, Robert T. Bruner, Henry V. Bruner, Charles M. Bruner, Martha E. Bruner, Patsey A. Bruner, Artimissa P. Bruner, and Lucretia C. Bruner. Farmer in Hancock County in 1860. Member of the Masonic Order at Hancock Lodge, No. 115 in Hawesville, Kentucky. Served in the Hancock County Home Guard in June 1861.
